import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import fire from '../config/fire'; function BillingAddress(props) { const db = fire.firestore(); useEffect(() => { let userAddress = db.collection("billingAddress").doc(props.userId); userAddress.get().then(function(doc){ if(doc.exists) { props.setBillAddress(doc.data().billingAddress) } }).catch(function(err){ console.log("Error getting document:", err); }) return () => { } }, []) return (
Billing Address
{props.saveAddress(e.target.value,"fullName")}} required/>
{props.saveAddress(e.target.value,"address1")}} required/>
{props.saveAddress(e.target.value,"address2")}} required/>
{props.saveAddress(e.target.value,"city")}} required/>
{props.saveAddress(e.target.value,"cityState")}} required/>
{props.saveAddress(e.target.value,"pincode")}} required/>
{props.saveAddress(e.target.value,"country")}} required/>
) } export default BillingAddress
